name: realtimestt-bridge
description: Use RealtimeSTT for one-shot speech-to-text from Claude via /stt-once.

commands.name: stt-once
commands.title: One-shot speech-to-text via RealtimeSTT
commands.description: Listens to the microphone once using RealtimeSTT and returns the transcript to Claude.

max_seconds.description: Maximum recording duration in seconds before stopping automatically.

silence_timeout.description: Seconds of silence after which recording is stopped.

commands.name: stt-arm
commands.title: Arm continuous RealtimeSTT listener
commands.description: Starts a background RealtimeSTT daemon that listens for trigger phrases (e.g. 'Claudia schreibe ...').

trigger_prefix.description: Trigger phrase that should activate actions (e.g. 'claude schreibe').

commands.name: stt-disarm
commands.title: Stop continuous RealtimeSTT listener
commands.description: Stops the background RealtimeSTT daemon if it is running.
